content: brackets: ====> c/*/.*/* 1 DMSXCG517I 32 occurrence(s) changed on 32 line(s) ====> c/ .*/.*/* * DMSXCG517I 18 occurrence(s) changed on 18 line(s) ====> c/(/[/* * ====> c/)/]/* * l. Clear the filters. Save your changes. Quit XEDIT by using the FILE subcommand: ====> all ====> file 13.Copy the new file to the TCPMAINT 198 disk by completing the following steps: a. Use VMLINK to access TCPMAINT 198 as file mode U read/write and display the contents by using FILELIST, as shown in Figure 6-14: ===> vmlink tcpmaint 198 < 1198 U MR > (filelist Figure 6-14 Initial view of FILELIST b. Make a backup copy of the existing SYSTEM DTCPARMS file by moving your cursor to the beginning of the SYSTEM DTCPARMS U1 line and typing the following text. You will type over part of the existing text as shown in Figure 6-15. If you make a mistake while you are typing, press F2 and start over; do not use backspace or delete: COPY / = DTCPWRKS = (OLDDATE Figure 6-15 Input of data into FILELIST (typing over part
